document_data.name: ''Argument Solver''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Argument Solver''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[greatclub]] from the [[Western Heartlands]] of [[Faerûn]].

{{quote|''Few things solve a disagreement faster than displaying a greatclub.''}}
document_data.Powers: ''Argument Solver'' possessed a ''+1'' enchantment that guided the bludgeon towards its targets and made its damage more severe. Additionally, ''Argument Solver'' reeked of foul and could discharge a cloud of [[poison]]ous mist upon contact with a target.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, ''Argument Solver'' was wielded by a member of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] based out of the [[Moonrise Towers]] in the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]].
